data.title: Don Israel
data.meta_description: Don Israel » Graphic Designer based out of Suffolk County, NY. Logos, Flyers, Business Cards, Digital Illustration, Web Design, Social Media Marketing and more.
data.text:
Resume

Professional Profile

Creative and results-driven Graphic Designer with a specialization in web design. Proven track record of success in leading design teams and delivering visually appealing, user-friendly webpages and emails, as well as ads for both digital and print mediums. Adept at managing projects from concept to completion, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and ensuring brand consistency.

Education

State University of Farmingdale, New York

Sep 2002 – May 2006

Bachelors

BA of Technology in Visual Communications

Skill Set

Adobe Photoshop

Adobe Illustrator

Adobe Dreamweaver

Adobe InDesign

Adobe Premiere

Adobe After Effects

HTML

Email Design

CSS

Bootstrap

PHP

Javascript

WordPress

HTML 5

Social Media Marketing

Work Experience

BroadcastMed

(Acquired Harborside Press LLC)

Oct 2022 – Present

Sr. Content Marketing Designer

Lead a team of designers through the execution of a high volume of design tasks including email design, microsite/landing page builds, digital display ads, event signage, promotional marketing materials and more.

Harborside Press LLC

Dec 2020 – Oct 2022

Email Designer

Responsible for designing and coding a variety of, and high volume of emails in collaboration with creative, marketing, editorial, sales, and project management teams.

Responsible for executing email development, design, and marketing tactics for many of our products, brands, and services.

Build, QA, and produce fully responsive emails that deliver on business goals.

Complete production for all assigned email communication needs including, preparing visual assets, debugging, quality control, and addressing editorial/design changes and revisions.

Follow branding guidelines to design, replicate, and adjust email layouts.

Gather insights from research and analytics to form new design solutions to meet business/user objectives.

The Paramount Theatre LLC

Aug 2019 – April 2020

Marketing Manager

Marketing Manager, responsible for promoting online ticket sales of concerts, shows and events via all social media platforms, with both organic and paid posts.

Utilize my skills as a Graphic Designer to quickly and efficiently produce videos and graphics to support show promoting posts.

During the period of one calendar year, our venue features an average of 225-250 shows. Each individual show requires it’s own unique marketing attention in targeting core demographics. Each week, I balance my focus between digitally promoting & driving ticket sales for newly announced shows versus driving last-minute ticket sales for shows happening during that particular week.

The Paramount’s marketing goal is to completely sell out every show, regardless of how strong or weak the demand is for any one particular show. This role demands attention to detail, the ability to work quickly & efficiently and the ability to multi-task.

Maintain the structure/function of The Paramount website and occasionally design and implement new features.

Connoisseur Media Long Island

May 2010 – July 2019

Web Graphic Designer

Produce and oversee all graphic design for marketing, sales and websites for five Long Island, NY radio stations; WALK-FM, WKJY-FM, WBZO-FM, WWSK-FM and WHLI-AM.

Create artwork, where needed, for our advertisers in the form of digital ads, both static and dynamically animated using HTML-5. I also managed the distribution of those ads via Google Desktop For Publishers across multiple digital platforms for each of our 5 stations including desktop, mobile, app and streaming.

Maintain weekly e-newsletters for our 5 radio stations, where layouts were built from scratch using HTML, and utilized our Content Management System to handle our databases, consisting of 200,000 users. It was my responsibility to identify hyper-targeted segments of our audiences and deliver communication based from demographically defined criteria.

Helm innovative sales-driven web projects for all 5 of our radio station websites, apps and streams.

Design and setting up visually compelling contest landing pages and featuring them through various forms of site navigation.

Work closely with the promotions department to design marketing & promotional materials such as signage, posters, flyers, tee-shirts & apparel, business cards, tents & tables, and event layout maps.

Fortress Global Investigations & Security

Nov 2007 – Apr 2009

Director of Operations

Responsible for resolving all IT related issues throughout the company including twenty workstations and one business-sized server.

Conducted digital fingerprinting services for several clients as a per pre-employment screening procedure in compliance with the American Banking Association.

Managed operations under the Vice President of the company including monitoring Case Manager Workflow and productivity.

Assisted the Vice President with various bookkeeping issues related to both accounts receivable and accounts payable.

Manage various Human Resource duties ranging from recruiting to handling of employee paperwork for personnel files.

Fortress Global Investigations & Security

Oct 2006 – Oct 2007

Graphic Designer

Function as the company’s sole, in-house Graphic Designer: designing everything from magazine ads, web ads, business cards, letterheads, and brochures to special event pieces including holiday cards, and award plaques. Also some experience in database design including creation of simple server-side applications written in PHP.

Assist in the maintenance of our firm’s website.

Assist IT administrator; handling all the technical computer related issues around the firm.

Assist in office operations & administration.

*References available upon request.
